Najbolji štoper među vezistima, najbolji vezista među štoperima – Barsa hoće južnoameričku verziju Havija Martineza
Toliko najavljivani transfer u Evropu bi mogao da se desi sledeće zime

01 Nov 2019

Pet godina se čeka taj transfer u Evropu i sledeća zima bi mogla da bude momenat.
Rodrigo Kajo iz Flamenga je u ovom trenutku verovatno najbolji štoper Južne Amerike. A sasvim sigurno najbolji štoper među vezistima i najbolji vezista među štoperima. Južnoamerička verzija Havija Martineza iz najboljih dana. Podjednako uspešan kao komandant odbrane ili zadnji vezni. Svejedno je na koju ga poziciju trener gurne. Igrač kojeg već godinama dovode u vezu sa transferom u neki od najvećih evropskih klubova se sada opet ozbiljno pominje kao zimsko pojačanje Barselone.
Interesovanje katalonskog giganta za Rodriga Kaja nije ništa novo. Razmišljali su o njemu i prošle zime kada je posle sedam godina napustio Sao Paulo ali je tada prešao u Flamengo kao deo skupocenog i ambicioznog projekta velikana sa Marakane. Ispostavio se kao pun pogodak. Sa Rubronegrima se plasirao u finale Kopa Libertadores i nalazi se na pragu 10 godina čekane titule prvaka Brazila. Sezona kakvu su navijači najpopularnijeg brazilskog kluba čekali skoro 40 godina. A Rodrigo Kajo ima nemerljiv doprinos sjajnim rezultatima ekipe Žorža Žezusa.
I zato je opet želja Barselone.
Marka piše da bi Katalonci već u januaru mogli da krenu u konačni napad na brazilskog univerzalca. Ako osvoji pomenute titule sa Flamengom, Rodrigo Kajo nema više šta da čeka u južnoameričkom fudbalu i bio bi to idealan momenat da dugo čekani transfer u Evropu. A taj transfer je dugo najavljivan…
Već pet godine sa Kajo pominje u skoro svakom prelaznom roku kao želja bogatih evropskih klubova. U više navrata ga je želeo Milan, potom mu je propao već dogovoren transfer u Valensiju, a želeli su ga i Pari Sen Žermen, Čelsi, Zenit… Nekadašnji Milanov, a danas Pari Sen Žermenov direktor Leonardo je veliki ljubitelj Kajovih kvaliteta i pokušavao je da ga dovede u oba ta kluba.
Barsa se ozbiljno aktivirala prošle zime kada je pratila Kaja zajedno sa nekolicinom štopera. Tada se odlučila sa jeftiniju varijantu i pozajmicu Džejsona Murilja iz Valensije, a letos nije uspela da dovede De Lihta i potraga za štoperom je odgođena do zime.
Marka piše da je Barselonin direktor Erik Abidal sa timom saradnika odlučio sada stavio u fokus dovođenje Brazilca za zimski prelazni rok.
Po karakteristikama, Rodrigo Kajo je idealan tip štopera za Barselonu. Sjajno se snalazi u visoko postavljenoj štoperskoj liniji, tehnički je superioran i baš to je ono što je potrebno Blaugrani. A ne bi trebalo da je preskup. Pominje se cena od oko 30.000.000 evra. Pojačani Barselonin interes ima veze i sa nedavnim vestima da je Lester ozbiljno zagrizao za Kaja, kao i još neki italijanski i engleski klubovi. Kupovina štopera ima veze i sa Samuelom Umtitijem. Čelnike Barse sve više brine stanje kolena francuskog reprezentativca koji nikako da ozdravi i da se vrati u nekadašnju formu. A zarađuje mnogo. Bez Umtitija u rotaciji Barselona ima trojicu štopera: Pikea, Lengelea i mladog Todiboa.
A polako treba pripremati terena i da neko jednog dana nasledi Pikea koji će u februaru  napuniti 33 godine. Po svim karaketristikama deluje da je Rodrigo Kajo “taj”.
(FOTO: reuters)

Best midfielder, best midfielder - Barsa wants the South American version of Javier Martinez
The much-announced transfer to Europe could happen next winter

01 Nov 2019

Five years are waiting for that transfer to Europe and next winter could be a moment.
Flamenco's Rodrigo Kajo is probably South America's best stopper at this point. And certainly the best stopper among midfielders and the best midfielder among stoppers. South American version of Havie Martinez from the best days. Equally successful as Defense Commander or Rear Midfielder. It doesn't matter what position the coach pushes him to. The player who has been linked with transfers for years at some of Europe's biggest clubs is now again seriously referred to as Barcelona's winter boost.
The Catalan giant's interest in Rodrigo Kay is nothing new. They thought about him last winter when he left Sao Paulo after seven years, but then moved to Flamengo as part of a costly and ambitious Marakana giant project. It turned out to be a full blow. With the Rubronegrams he has reached the finals of the Copa Libertadores and is on the verge of 10 years of waiting for the Brazilian champion title. The season that fans of the most popular Brazilian club have been waiting for almost 40 years. And Rodrigo Cayo has made an immeasurable contribution to the brilliant results of Georges Jesus.
And that's why Barcelona's desire is again.
Marco writes that the Catalans could launch a final attack on the Brazilian universal as early as January. If he wins the aforementioned titles with Flamengo, Rodrigo Kajo has nothing to wait for in South American football and would be an ideal moment for a long awaited transfer to Europe. And that transfer has been announced for a long time…
For five years he has been mentioned with Kajo in almost every transitional period as the wish of rich European clubs. He was repeatedly wanted by Milan, then he failed the already agreed transfer to Valencia, and he also wanted Paris Saint-Germain, Chelsea, Zenit… Former Milanese, and today Paris Saint-Germain director Leonardo is a big fan of Kai's qualities and tried to bring him to both of those clubs.
The barge got seriously activated last winter when she accompanied Kai along with a few stallers. She then opted for the cheaper variant and loan of Jason Murillo from Valencia, and this summer failed to bring De Licht and the search for the stall was delayed until winter.
The brand writes that Barcelona director Eric Abidal, with a team of associates, has now decided to focus on bringing the Brazilian in for the winter transition.
In terms of features, Rodrigo Kajo is the ideal stopper type for Barcelona. He works great in a high-pitched stopper line, is technically superior, and that's exactly what the Blaugrani need. And it shouldn't be too expensive. The price of about 30,000,000 euros is mentioned. Barcelona's increased interest also has to do with the recent news that Lester has seriously quarreled with Kai, as well as some Italian and English clubs. The purchase of the stopper also has to do with Samuel Umtiti. The Barca leaders are increasingly concerned about the condition of the knee of the French national team, which is in no way able to recover and return to its former form. And he earns a lot. Without Umtiti in the rotation of Barcelona he has three stoppers: Pike, Lengele and young Todibo.
And one should slowly prepare the ground for someone to one day succeed Pike, who will turn 33 in February. In all characteristics, Rodrigo Cajo seems to be the "one".
